messages.subject: Re: art work
messages.msgSnippet: My dh was telling me how he used to do war scenes during school art. Pictures of soldiers with pools and pools of blood.  Says he doesn t remember teacher
messages.messageBody:
My dh was telling me how he used to do war scenes during school art.
Pictures of soldiers with pools and pools of blood. Says he doesn't
remember teacher making an issue of it; it was in the early 60's. He is
one of the most gentle people I know.
Mary Ellen
Gain weight... Stay Active... Get Smarter...
New Year's Resolutions are EASY for Babies!
<Hi and Lois>

>>>>He used to draw these lovely pictures of houses. colour
them in and then scribble all over them in red making it look as
though the house was burning down.
I am sure there is some psychologist out there some where who would
have a reason why he did this!!
My eldest is now in his 30's and has never burned down a house - well
not yet anyway!!
